compatibility.translation[0].definitions: the ability of one piece of computer equipment to be used with another one, especially when they are made by different companies
the system’s compatibility with Windows software
the ability to exist or be used together without causing problems
the ability to have a good relationship with someone because you have similar interests, ideas etc
compatibility.translation[1].definitions: the ability of one piece of computer equipment or software to be used with another
the system’s compatibility with Windows software
